3: What are they talking about? Infected... is it the Punishing Virus?
Help me keep them down! The guards are going to...
Sir! We came immediately when we saw your flare...
There's no time to explain... Get our guys out of here!
Bianca, you're not going to get any information from them here and now.
Let them go, and the remaining Forsakens and I will help you take care of the guards.
If they remember something after they're gone, I'll not keep it from you. I swear on the Forsaken's honor.
Why is it like this every time I run into you?
Forsakens! Get our people out now!
